title: Ninpen Manmaru
alternative_title: Manmaru the Ninja Penguin, 忍ペンまん丸
description: Manmaru goes to ninja school at Nenga, where foxes and raccoons study the art of assassination under a bear ninja master. He is soon thrown in to local rivalry between the Nenga school, the Koga (monkeys), and the Iga (dogs), as well as facing temptations from the Dobe, a group of dropouts from the Nenga.
